rEye - Range Internet Eye
=========================

_All your issues can be discussed in [Issues Page](https://github.com/rabits/reye/issues)_

## About

*rEye* - online video server from your built-in camera.

Nokia N9 has good on-board camera, it can be used for online multicopter FPV with rEye.

## v1.0

 * Capture video with minimal latency
 * Resolution, quality (bitrate) and output port settings
 * Video recording
